| name              = Nomad's Brigandine
| icon              = poe2 brigandine_armor_exceptional icon.png
| description       = This suit of armor is made in the fashion of the nomadic peoples of the far Ixamitl plains. The horse archer who owned it likely wore it on numerous raids and overland migrations. Such a piece of armor is priceless to the people of the far plains and was likely as precious to the owner as his own horse.

Small symbols have been etched into the lacquered lamellae. Some marks appear to be names while others seem to be protective runes or charms. Whether or not such wards proved effective for the nomad is impossible to determine, as is how such an exotic brigandine made its way to the Deadfire.
